TaskControl

The TaskControl manages the timing of the entire simulation and the correct correlation of incoming and outgoing data.

The TaskControl (TC) is the central element of the simulation, managing the main command and data flow. It provides individual interfaces to each component and may serve various communication protocols.

What do you want to do?

Data Configuration

Configure which objects NI Veristand receives and transmits into Vires VTD over the Runtime Data Bus (RDB).

Default values are 48190 for Rx and 48191 for Tx.

Control Configuration

Controls the Vires VTD simulation enviroment over the Simulation Control Protocol (SCP).

Default values are 48179 for both Rx and Tx. Currently you can only transmit SCP messages to VIRES.
